title: Jason Statham and Rosie Huntington-Whiteley dote on son Jack, 2, on fun outing to Beverly Hills park
text:
She's a top model and he's a Hollywood action star.

But on Wednesday Rosie Huntington-Whiteley and Jason Statham were just a mom and dad enjoying a trip to a park with their young son.

The couple doted on two-year-old Jack who was kitted out in a Batman costume.

Family: She's a model and he's a Hollywood star. But Wednesday, Rosie Huntington-Whiteley and Jason Statham were just mom and dad enjoying a trip to a park with their young son

Statham, 52, was also seen pushing Jack in a stroller that doubled as a miniature race car.

The Hobbs & Shaw star was sportily dressed in an all-Nike ensemble of hoodie, knee-length shorts and trainers and added a baseball cap.

Huntington-Whiteley, 32, opted for a black leather jacket over a baggy white long-sleeve top with black leggings and white sneakers.

She wore her blonde hair up under a baseball cap.

Doting dad: Statham, 52, who was decked out in Nike gear, was seen pushing Jack, two, in a stroller that doubled as a miniature race car

Huntington-Whiteley, 32, opted for a black leather jacket over a baggy white long-sleeve top with black leggings and white sneakers

Play time: The English model wore her blonde hair up under a baseball cap and had fun blowing bubbles during the outing

The English model also spent some time blowing bubbles as she enjoyed her family outing.

Statham and Huntington-Whiteley started dating in 2010 and got engaged in January 2016.

They welcomed their son in 2017.
description: Statham, 52, was also seen pushing Jack in a stroller that doubled as a miniature race car.
